entry.title: Pro Tuff-Job™ W610 - High Performance Wipers (10 x 126s)
entry.summary:
Vendor: CASCADES
Type: Industrial Wiper
Price: 149.50

  • Ideal replacements for rental shop towels or rags
  • Excellent durability, strength, absorbency and solvent resistance
  • Perfect for heavy-duty machine & part wiping, applying solvents or thinners, adhesive cleaning, cable lubricant removal, tool clean-ups and applying stains
  • The ideal choice for applications that require resistance to solvents and virtually lint free wiping - applying aircraft solvents, wiping down print presses or plates and solvents for furniture stains
  • Allow you to control costs through reusability, consistent case count, size and quality
  • The next wiper pops up into position as each wiper is dispensed, offering easy dispensing and quality performance
  • Accepted for use in Canadian food processing facilities
Type  Heavy-Duty
Colour White
Sheets/box 126
Boxes/case 10

entry.title: PRO Tuff-Job® W922 - antimicrobial foodservice towels 1/4 fold - Blue (150ct)
entry.summary:
Vendor: CASCADES
Type: Wiper
Price: 62.30

These durable and machine washable foodservice towels are both absorbent and reusable and ideal for the professional kitchen. Designed to provide superior cleaning performance whether used dry or with harsh sanitizers or disinfecting solutions, these towels are easy to rinse clean and fast drying ensuring a long-lasting product. This blue colored towel assists in masking stains for a cleaner appearance and a seamless replacement for linen rental or cloth dish towels. Made with a protectant antimicrobial agent, which inhibits the growth of odor causing bacteria and mold for the life of the towel.

Colour  Blue
Dimensions 12 x 24 in (30.5 x 61 cm)
Fold 1/4 fold
Sheets/box 150

entry.title: Pro Perform™ F300 - Facial Tissues (30 x 100)
entry.summary:
Vendor: CASCADES
Type: Facial Tissue
Price: 33.20

  • Made from 100% unbleached recycled fibre of which 80% is from post-consumer material
  • The most environmentally responsible choice on the market, by adding 20% corrugated box fibre into its pulp mix and eliminating bleaching chemicals
  • Reduces the environmental impact of its raw material by 25%
  • A revolutionary facial tissue, without compromising softness
  • Contains 0% bleaching chemicals
  • Third party certifications include Green Seal®, UL ECOLOGO® 175, and offset with 100% green-e® certified wind electricity

Sheets/box 100

entry.title: Pro Tandem™ - Twin Jumbo Toilet Paper Dispenser - White
entry.summary:
Vendor: CASCADES
Type: Dispenser
Price: 17.99

This high-performance no-touch hand towel dispenser is 99.9% jam-free and is built for better hygiene with a modern and seamless design.

  • Features a sleek, modern finish and a no-touch dispensing mechanism
  • Ideal for use in busy restrooms across the education, retail, industrial, foodservice, and commercial building markets
  • More compact which makes it ideal for smaller stalls
  • Top roll is fully enclosed within the dispenser adding another level of hygiene for end-users
  • Built-in stub roll within the dispenser helps to increase capacity by up to 16%
Colour White
Roll Capacity Multiple
Dimensions 20.5 x 5.6

entry.title: Pro Perform™ Green Seal® T263 - Jumbo Toilet Paper - Moka (6 x 1400')
entry.summary:
Vendor: CASCADES
Type: jumbo bathroom tissue
Price: 57.05

Cascades PRO Perform™ jumbo roll toilet paper has all your bases covered in high-traffic restrooms. Its 1400 feet of 2-ply tissue will leave you feeling clean while its 100% recycled fiber and 60% post-consumer material has earned it the Green Seal, UL and Green-e Certification. Sustainability is in our DNA, so we've even exceeded EPA Comprehensive procurement guidelines. Cover all your bases with our jumbo roll tissues that have been designed to work exclusively with Tandem jumbo roll toilet paper dispensers. This product is biodegradable and safe for plumbing and septic systems. This product meets the Green Seal™ Standard GS-1, based on chlorine-free processing, energy and water efficiency, and content of 100% recovered material with a minimum of 60% post-consumer material.

Ply  2-Ply
Sheets/roll Un-perforated
Roll Length 1400'
Colour Moka
Roll Type Jumbo
Rolls/Case 6

entry.title: Pro Select™ B140 - Jumbo Toilet Paper (12 x 1000')
entry.summary:
Vendor: CASCADES
Type: jumbo bathroom tissue
Price: 47.20

Cascades PRO Select™ jumbo toilet paper is the ideal choice for customers who want a strong and affordable bath tissue that still maintains quality. Made from 100% recycled fiber and Green Seal certified, this toilet paper will meet the needs of any of your environmentally concerned customers. Soft and reliable, high-traffic restrooms across industrial, foodservice, retail and schools will cover all bases with this jumbo toilet paper. This product is biodegradable and safe for plumbing and septic systems. This product meets the Green Seal™ Standard GS-1, based on chlorine-free processing, energy and water efficiency, and content of 100% recovered material with a minimum of 50% post-consumer material.

  • For use in high traffic areas
  • Made from 100% recycled fibres and 50% post-consumer recycled materials
  • Combines softness, strength and sparkling whiteness at a competitive price
  • Jumbo roll size requires fewer refills and reduces maintenance costs
  • Universal 3.3" core is designed to fit virtually all size jumbo tissue dispensers
  • Large rolls are hard to conceal, making them pilfer-proof
Dimensions 3.45 in x 1000'
Strength  2-Ply
Quantity 12 rolls x 1000'
Weight 22.2 lb (10.1 kg)
Manufacture Cascades
Brand PRO Select
Manufacture Code B140
